H0.text: Medicine and computers are the technologies that allow people to live far from their loved ones, since most family members today live all over the country, whereas years ago they lived near one another.

H1.text: Manufacturing and home entertainment are the technologies that enable people to live far from their loved ones, as family members are now spread all over the country instead of living near one another years ago.

H2.text: Refrigeration and heating systems are the technologies that enable people to live far from their loved ones, allowing family members to reside all over the country despite the historical tendency for them to live near one another.

H3.text: Communication and transportation are the technologies that enable people to live far from their loved ones, allowing family members who previously lived near one another to now live all over the country.
